verses.roman:
'haridāsa kāṅhā?' yadi śrīvāsa puchilā
"sva-karma-phala-bhuk pumān"--prabhu uttara dilā

synonyms: haridāsa kāṅhā—where is junior Haridāsa; yadi—when; śrīvāsa puchilā—Śrīvāsa Ṭhākura inquired; sva-karma-phala-bhuk—sure to accept the resultant action of his fruitive activities; pumān—a person; prabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; uttara dilā—replied.
translation: When Śrīvāsa Ṭhākura inquired from Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu, "Where is Junior Haridāsa?" The Lord replied, "A person is sure to achieve the results of his fruitive activities."
